CustomField.description: Description that goes with the income type code
CustomField.formula: CASE( ucinn_ascendv2__Opportunity__r.Type , 'Discounted Gift', 'Discounted Gift Payment', 'Planned Gift','Planned Gift Payment', 'Outright Gift','Outright Gift', 'Outright','Outright Gift', 'Pledge Commitment','Pledge Payment', 'Matching','Outright Gift', 'Discounted Planned Gift','Discounted Planned Gift', 'Deferred Liability','Deferred Liability', 'Installment Based Membership','Pledge Payment', 'Auto Renewing Membership','Outright Gift', 'One-Time Membership','Outright Gift', '')
CustomField.label: Income Type Description
